profile_summary:
As a Frontend Tech Lead with 8 years of experience, I excel in creating dynamic, high-performance web applications using **React**, **TypeScript**, **Next.js**, and UI/UX best practices. I have a strong focus on **i18n** implementations, **Crowdin** for localization, and leveraging **Turborepo** and **NX** for efficient multi-repo management. My expertise extends into SEO optimizations and PageSpeed enhancements, ensuring optimal analytics and A/B testing strategies for improved user engagement. 
Alongside my technical skills, I have a proven track record in stakeholder communication and process optimization, ensuring that project deliveries are aligned with business objectives and timelines. My experience spans the healthcare and financial sectors, where I've led teams to develop enterprise-grade platforms and integrations, ensuring compliance with industry standards. I bring a strong foundation in using collaborative tools such as **Figma** for design and emphasis on delivery-oriented methodologies.
